com.azure.storage.common.credentials

Class SharedKeyCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.common.credentials.SharedKeyCredential

  • public final class SharedKeyCredential
extends java.lang.Object
    SharedKey credential policy that is put into a header to authorize requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SharedKeyCredential(java.lang.String accountName, java.lang.String accountKey)
      Initializes a new instance of SharedKeyCredential contains an account's name and its primary or secondary accountKey.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String accountName()
      Gets the account name associated with the request.
      java.lang.String computeHmac256(java.lang.String stringToSign)
      Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.
      static SharedKeyCredential fromConnectionString(java.lang.String connectionString)
      Creates a SharedKey credential from the passed connection string.
      java.lang.String generateAuthorizationHeader(java.net.URL requestURL, java.lang.String httpMethod, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
      Generates the SharedKey Authorization value from information in the request.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedKeyCredential

        public SharedKeyCredential(java.lang.String accountName,
                           java.lang.String accountKey)
        Initializes a new instance of SharedKeyCredential contains an account's name and its primary or secondary accountKey.
        Parameters:
        accountName - The account name associated with the request.
        accountKey - The account access key used to authenticate the request.

    • Method Detail

      • fromConnectionString

        public static SharedKeyCredential fromConnectionString(java.lang.String connectionString)
        Creates a SharedKey credential from the passed connection string.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - Connection string used to build the SharedKey credential.
        Returns:
        a SharedKey credential if the connection string contains AccountName and AccountKey
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If connectionString doesn't have AccountName or AccountKey.

      • accountName

        public java.lang.String accountName()
        Gets the account name associated with the request.
        Returns:
        The account name.

      • generateAuthorizationHeader

        public java.lang.String generateAuthorizationHeader(java.net.URL requestURL,
                                                    java.lang.String httpMethod,
                                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
        Generates the SharedKey Authorization value from information in the request.
        Parameters:
        requestURL - URL of the request
        httpMethod - HTTP method being used
        headers - Headers on the request
        Returns:
        the SharedKey authorization value

      • computeHmac256

        public java.lang.String computeHmac256(java.lang.String stringToSign)
                                throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm. Package-private because it is used to generate SAS signatures.
        Parameters:
        stringToSign - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the accountKey is not a valid Base64-encoded string.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the HmacSHA256 algorithm isn't supported.
